play-manager.subtitle: Visualize and manage your Spotify profile and playlists.
play-manager.p1: This application allows you to visualize and explore insights about your favorite tracks and artists acrossdifferent time ranges, all within a clear and intuitive interface.
play-manager.p2: It also provides advanced playlist management features, such as shuffling entire playlists, sorting tracks by release date, and enabling automatic sorting through scheduled cron jobs to keep your playlists organized effortlessly.
